actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Domestic Volunteer Service Act of 1973 to provide that volunteers in foster grandparent programs may furnish supportive services to mentally retarded individuals regardless of the age of such individuals.

summary.text: Provides that volunteers in foster grandparent programs may furnish supportive services to mentally retarded individuals regardless of the age of such individuals under the Domestic Volunteer Service Act of 1973.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Domestic Volunteer Service Act of 1973 to provide that volunteers in foster grandparent programs may furnish supportive services to mentally retarded individuals regardless of the age of such individuals.
